@IMAC2 @_Nec @SaraSoueidan @Netlify It does. Netlify takes the output of your build and automatically deploys it to its global CDN. Lots of the smart stuff happens right on the CDN at the edge. Even A/B testing, custom redirections, language and regional content routing happen at the CDN level.
